fields.name: ENABLE
fields.description: Enables PXP operation with specified parameters

fields.name: IRQ_ENABLE
fields.description: Interrupt enable When using the PXP_NEXT functionality to reprogram the PXP, the new value of this bit will be used and may therefore enable or disable an interrupt unintentionally

fields.name: NEXT_IRQ_ENABLE
fields.description: Next command interrupt enable

fields.name: ENABLE_LCD_HANDSHAKE
fields.description: Enable handshake with LCD controller

fields.name: ROTATE
fields.description: Indicates the clockwise rotation to be applied at the output buffer

fields.name: HFLIP
fields.description: Indicates that the output buffer should be flipped horizontally (effect applied before rotation).

fields.name: VFLIP
fields.description: Indicates that the output buffer should be flipped vertically (effect applied before rotation).

fields.name: ROT_POS
fields.description: This bit controls where rotation will occur in the PXP datapath

fields.name: BLOCK_SIZE
fields.description: Select the block size to process.

fields.name: EN_REPEAT
fields.description: Enable the PXP to run continuously

enumeratedValues.name: Complete
enumeratedValues.description: PXP will complete the process and enter the idle state ready to accept the next frame to be processed

enumeratedValues.name: Repeat
enumeratedValues.description: PXP will repeat based on the current configuration register settings

fields.name: CLKGATE
fields.description: This bit must be set to zero for normal operation

enumeratedValues.name: Gated
enumeratedValues.description: All clocks to PXP is gated-off

fields.name: SFTRST
fields.description: This bit can be turned on and then off to reset the PXP block to its default state.

enumeratedValues.name: Disabled
enumeratedValues.description: Clocking with PXP is disabled and held in its reset (lowest power) state. This is the default value.

fields.name: IRQ
fields.description: Indicates current PXP interrupt status

fields.name: AXI_WRITE_ERROR
fields.description: Indicates PXP encountered an AXI write error and processing has been terminated.

fields.name: AXI_READ_ERROR
fields.description: Indicates PXP encountered an AXI read error and processing has been terminated.

fields.name: NEXT_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that a command issued with the "Next Command" functionality has been issued and that a new command may be initiated with a write to the PXP_NEXT register

fields.name: AXI_ERROR_ID
fields.description: Indicates the AXI ID of the failing bus operation.

fields.name: LUT_DMA_LOAD_DONE_IRQ
fields.description: Indicates that the LUT DMA transfer has completed.

enumeratedValues.name: Active
enumeratedValues.description: LUT DMA LOAD transfer is active

enumeratedValues.name: Complete
enumeratedValues.description: LUT DMA LOAD transfer is complete

fields.name: FORMAT
fields.description: Output framebuffer format

enumeratedValues.name: Y4
enumeratedValues.description: 4-bit monochrome pixels (1-plane Y luma, 4 bit truncation)

fields.name: INTERLACED_OUTPUT
fields.description: Determines how the PXP writes it's output data

enumeratedValues.name: PROGRESSIVE
enumeratedValues.description: All data written in progressive format to the OUTBUF Pointer.

enumeratedValues.name: FIELD0
enumeratedValues.description: Interlaced output: only data for field 0 is written to the OUTBUF Pointer.

enumeratedValues.name: FIELD1
enumeratedValues.description: Interlaced output: only data for field 1 is written to the OUTBUF2 Pointer.

enumeratedValues.name: INTERLACED
enumeratedValues.description: Interlaced output: data for field 0 is written to OUTBUF and data for field 1 is written to OUTBUF2.

fields.name: ALPHA_OUTPUT
fields.description: Indicates that alpha component in output buffer pixels should be overwritten by PXP_OUT_CTRL[ALPHA]

fields.name: ALPHA
fields.description: When generating an output buffer with an alpha component, the value in this field will be used when enabled to override the alpha passed through the pixel data pipeline

fields.description: Output framebuffer format

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Current address pointer for the output frame buffer

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Current address pointer for the output frame buffer

fields.name: PITCH
fields.description: Indicates the number of bytes in memory between two vertically adjacent pixels.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: Indicates the number of vertical PIXELS in the output surface (non-rotated)

fields.name: X
fields.description: Indicates number of horizontal PIXELS in the output surface (non-rotated)

fields.name: Y
fields.description: This field indicates the upper left Y-coordinate (in pixels) of the processed surface in the output buffer

fields.name: X
fields.description: This field indicates the upper left X-coordinate (in pixels) of the processed surface (PS) in the output buffer

fields.name: Y
fields.description: This field indicates the lower right Y-coordinate (in pixels) of the processed surface in the output frame buffer

fields.name: X
fields.description: This field indicates the lower right X-coordinate (in pixels) of the processed surface (PS) in the output frame buffer

fields.name: Y
fields.description: This field indicates the upper left Y-coordinate (in pixels) of the alpha surface in the output frame buffer

fields.name: X
fields.description: This field indicates the upper left X-coordinate (in pixels) of the alpha surface (AS) in the output frame buffer

fields.name: Y
fields.description: This field indicates the lower right Y-coordinate (in pixels) of the alpha surface in the output frame buffer

fields.name: X
fields.description: This field indicates the lower right X-coordinate (in pixels) of the alpha surface (AS) in the output frame buffer

fields.name: FORMAT
fields.description: PS buffer format. To select between YUV and YCbCr formats, see bit 31 of the CSC1_COEF0 register.

enumeratedValues.name: RGB888_ARGB8888
enumeratedValues.description: 32-bit pixels (unpacked 24-bit format with/without alpha at high 8bits)

enumeratedValues.name: RGB444_ARGB4444
enumeratedValues.description: 16-bit pixels with/without alpha at high 4 bits

enumeratedValues.name: Y4
enumeratedValues.description: 4-bit monochrome pixels (1-plane Y luma, 4 bit truncation)

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA8888
enumeratedValues.description: 2-bit pixels with alpha at the low 8 bits

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA5551
enumeratedValues.description: 16-bit pixels with alpha at the low 1bits

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA4444
enumeratedValues.description: 16-bit pixels with alpha at the low 4 bits

fields.name: WB_SWAP
fields.description: Swap bytes in words. For each 16 bit word, the two bytes will be swapped.

fields.name: DECY
fields.description: Verticle pre decimation filter control.

fields.name: DECX
fields.description: Horizontal pre decimation filter control.

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Address pointer for the PS RGB or Y (luma) input buffer.

registers.name: PS_UBUF
registers.description: PS U/Cb or 2 Plane UV Input Buffer Address

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Address pointer for the PS U/Cb or 2 plane UV Chroma input buffer.

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Address pointer for the PS V/Cr Chroma input buffer.

fields.name: PITCH
fields.description: Indicates the number of bytes in memory between two vertically adjacent pixels.

fields.name: COLOR
fields.description: Background color (in 24bpp format) for any pixels not within the buffer range specified by the PS ULC/LRC

fields.name: XSCALE
fields.description: This is a two bit integer and 12 bit fractional representation (##

fields.name: YSCALE
fields.description: This is a two bit integer and 12 bit fractional representation (##

fields.name: XOFFSET
fields.description: This is a 12 bit fractional representation (0

fields.name: YOFFSET
fields.description: This is a 12 bit fractional representation (0

fields.name: PIXEL
fields.description: Low range of color key applied to PS buffer

fields.name: PIXEL
fields.description: High range of color key applied to PS buffer

fields.name: ALPHA_CTRL
fields.description: Determines how the alpha value is constructed for this alpha surface

enumeratedValues.name: Embedded
enumeratedValues.description: Indicates that the AS pixel alpha value will be used to blend the AS with PS. The ALPHA field is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: Override
enumeratedValues.description: Indicates that the value in the ALPHA field should be used instead of the alpha values present in the input pixels.

enumeratedValues.name: Multiply
enumeratedValues.description: Indicates that the value in the ALPHA field should be used to scale all pixel alpha values. Each pixel alpha is multiplied by the value in the ALPHA field.

enumeratedValues.name: ROPs
enumeratedValues.description: Enable ROPs. The ROP field indicates an operation to be performed on the alpha surface and PS pixels.

fields.name: ENABLE_COLORKEY
fields.description: Indicates that colorkey functionality is enabled for this alpha surface

fields.name: FORMAT
fields.description: Indicates the input buffer format for AS.

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA888
enumeratedValues.description: 2-bit pixel with alpha at low 8 bits

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA5551
enumeratedValues.description: 16-bit pixel with alpha at low 1 bit

enumeratedValues.name: RGBA4444
enumeratedValues.description: 16-bit pixel with alpha at low 4 bits

fields.name: ALPHA
fields.description: Alpha modifier used when the ALPHA_MULTIPLY or ALPHA_OVERRIDE values are programmed in PXP_AS_CTRL[ALPHA_CTRL]

fields.name: ROP
fields.description: Indicates a raster operation to perform when enabled

fields.name: ALPHA_INVERT
fields.description: Setting this bit to logic 0 will not alter the alpha value

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Address pointer for the alpha surface 0 buffer.

fields.name: PITCH
fields.description: Indicates the number of bytes in memory between two vertically adjacent pixels.

fields.name: PIXEL
fields.description: Low range of RGB color key applied to AS buffer. Each overlay has an independent colorkey enable.

fields.name: PIXEL
fields.description: High range of RGB color key applied to AS buffer. Each overlay has an independent colorkey enable.

fields.name: Y_OFFSET
fields.description: Two's compliment amplitude offset implicit in the Y data

fields.name: UV_OFFSET
fields.description: Two's compliment phase offset implicit for CbCr data

fields.name: C0
fields.description: Two's compliment Y multiplier coefficient. YUV=0x100 (1.000) YCbCr=0x12A (1.164)

fields.name: BYPASS
fields.description: Bypass the CSC unit in the scaling engine

fields.name: YCBCR_MODE
fields.description: Set to 1 when performing YCbCr conversion to RGB

fields.name: C4
fields.description: Two's compliment Blue U/Cb multiplier coefficient. YUV=0x208 (2.032) YCbCr=0x204 (2.017)

fields.name: C1
fields.description: Two's compliment Red V/Cr multiplier coefficient. YUV=0x123 (1.140) YCbCr=0x198 (1.596)

fields.name: C3
fields.description: Two's complement Green U/Cb multiplier coefficient. YUV=0x79C (-0.394) YCbCr=0x79C (-0.392)

fields.name: C2
fields.description: Two's complement Green V/Cr multiplier coefficient. YUV=0x76B (-0.581) YCbCr=0x730 (-0.813)

fields.name: ROT_MEM_LP_STATE
fields.description: Select the low power state of the Rotation (ROT) memory.

enumeratedValues.name: NONE
enumeratedValues.description: Memory is not in low power state.

enumeratedValues.name: LS
enumeratedValues.description: Light Sleep Mode. Low leakage mode, maintain memory contents.

enumeratedValues.name: DS
enumeratedValues.description: Deep Sleep Mode. Low leakage mode, maintain memory contents.

enumeratedValues.name: SD
enumeratedValues.description: Shut Down Mode. Shut Down periphery and core, no memory retention.

fields.name: CTRL
fields.description: Power control for the PXP.

fields.name: ENABLED
fields.description: Indicates that the "next frame" functionality has been enabled

fields.name: POINTER
fields.description: A pointer to a data structure containing register values to be used when processing the next frame

registers.name: PORTER_DUFF_CTRL
registers.description: PXP Alpha Engine A Control Register.

fields.name: PORTER_DUFF_ENABLE
fields.description: Porter-Duff Enable

fields.name: S0_S1_FACTOR_MODE
fields.description: s0 to s1 factor mode

fields.name: S0_GLOBAL_ALPHA_MODE
fields.description: s0 global alpha mode

fields.name: S0_ALPHA_MODE
fields.description: s0 alpha mode (Porter-Duff alpha mode)

fields.name: S0_COLOR_MODE
fields.description: s0 color mode (Porter-Duff color mode)

fields.name: S1_S0_FACTOR_MODE
fields.description: s1 to s0 factor mode (Porter-Duff factor mode)

fields.name: S1_GLOBAL_ALPHA_MODE
fields.description: s1 global alpha mode (Porter-Duff Global Alpha mode)

fields.name: S1_ALPHA_MODE
fields.description: s1 alpha mode (Porter-Duff Alpha mode)

fields.name: S1_COLOR_MODE
fields.description: s1 color mode
